name: KubiK (Demo)
description: Welcome to the concrete hell Kubik is a game that follows the adventure of a little rat trying to find his way out of a maze. But it is no ordinary maze, as the rooms of the labyrinth move and rotate to make sure the rat stays right where it belongs. However, this change is not only a threat but also an opportunity for our little rodent, as it will allow him to reach the keys he needs to get out of this concrete hell. In Kubik, get lost over and over again before you can find the exit.  Kubik is still in development and this is only a demo build used to gather feedback. Please be aware that anything you see is subject to change.  Kubik is supports keyboard and controller. Controls Move: WASD/Left Stick Jump: Spacebar/Bottom Face Button  Interact: F/Left Face Button Credits Level Design:         Paul Sevin        Eva Moretti 3D Art:        Luca Geraci Programming:        Ashley Monpeurt
